### Bus ISA, PCI
Bus ISA(8 or 16 bits),Old ,has been replaced by bus PCI(32 bits). 

![](../../documentation/images/Kernel-ISA-PCI-Bus.png)

[PCI bus interface card](http://markmuzzin.blogspot.com/2011/10/pci-bus-interface-card.html)
